start.description: You stand in a quiet forest clearing. Birds chirp overhead. Exits lead north and east.

mountain_path.description: A steep path winds up the mountainside. The air is crisp and fresh.

river_bank.name: River Bank
river_bank.description: You stand beside a flowing river. The water rushes past swiftly.

still_waters.description: You find yourself standing in still waters. The cool caress of the stream feels nice and relaxing.

a_dead_end.name: A Dead End
a_dead_end.description: This room seems to be an end-of-the-road. There is nothing here. Odd.

river_swimming.description: You make your way into the calming river and begin to take a relaxing swim.
